cr.title: United States-Peru Trade Promotion Agreement Implementation Act
cr.topics: United States-Peru Trade Promotion Agreement Implementation Act: TITLE VI--OFFSETS
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I thank Ranking Member Herger and the chairman of the Ways and Means Committee for leading, I think, a terrific bipartisan effort. I rise today in support of expanding our Nation's export markets by passing the bipartisan Peru Trade Promotion Agreement. The agreement will create significant new opportunities for American...

cr.title: A Quarterly Report Card
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, although we are coming to an end to this time of discussion, I think that we all hope that promoting prosperity that has taken place over the last few years will not come to an end. And I want to very quickly point out that this is what is about to come to an end, even though it has been working, even though we have been creating...

cr.title: Recognizing North Platte, Nebraska, As "Rail Town Usa"
cr.excerpt: Thank you, I appreciate that. First I would like to thank Chairman Oberstar, Chairwoman Brown, Ranking Member Mica and Ranking Member Shuster for their support of this resolution. As you've heard, this resolution would recognize North Platte, Nebraska, as Rail Town USA. North Platte is a thriving community of over 25,000 people possessing a ...

cr.title: Celebrating National Agriculture Week
cr.excerpt: I thank the gentleman from Iowa. As I wrap this up, I certainly want to thank the gentleman for really focusing on the future, and I think the sky is the limit when we can focus on the benefits of agriculture and perhaps the things we take for granted. But as we talk about the future and younger generations engaging in agriculture, I find...
